Art. 4.167. 
Failure to accept in the case of a minor or a protected person of full age [...1 ...]1
Minors and protected persons who, by virtue of article 492/1 of the former Civil Code, have been declared incapable of receiving gifts, are not restituted against failure to accept. They only have recourse against their father or mother, their tutor or against their administrator, if applicable.
